title: IPP Common Sensing Geospatial Datasets
description: A catalog of optical and synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellite datasets and derived products. Hosted by Satellite Applications Catapult.

sensors.title: Copernicus Sentinel-2 datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Sentinel-2 datasets. Obtained from Copernicus Hub and Google Cloud and prepared by Catapult.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-8 Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-8 datasets. Surface reflectance products ordered via ESPA and prepared by Catapult.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-7 Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-7 datasets. Surface reflectance products ordered via ESPA and prepared by Catapult.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-5 Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-5 datasets. Surface reflectance products ordered via ESPA and prepared by Catapult.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-4 Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-4 datasets. Surface reflectance products ordered via ESPA and prepared by Catapult.

sensors.title: ESA Sentinel-1 Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Sentinel-1 datasets. Gamma0 Backscatter products downloaded via ASF, processed and prepared by Catapult.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-4 WOFS Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-4 Water Observations from Space (WOFS) datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-5 WOFS Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-5 Water Observations from Space (WOFS) datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-7 WOFS Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-7 Water Observations from Space (WOFS) datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-8 WOFS Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-8 Water Observations from Space (WOFS) datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Sentinel-2 WOFS Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Sentinel-2 Water Observations from Space (WOFS) datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-5 MLWater Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-5 machine learning generated water mask datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-7 MLWater Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-7 machine learning generated water mask datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Landsat-8 MLWater Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Landsat-8 machine learning generated water mask datasets.

sensors.title: USGS Sentinel-2 ML Water Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Sentinel-2 machine learning generated water mask datasets.

sensors.title: ESA Sentinel-1 ML Water Datasets
sensors.description: A collection of Sentinel-1 dmachine learning generated water mask datasets.

sensors.title: SPOT1_MS datasets
sensors.description: A collection of SPOT1_MS datasets. Procured from Airbus, prepared by UNEP-Geneva.
